ComicInfo.Summary:
Anthology Volume Containing the stories:
Axel Pressbutton 'The Movie'
Pale Horses
Stripey in 'Social Victim Fashion Frenzy'
Where is It?
King Leon Part Two (of Three)
Frankenstein Meets Shirley Temple Part Three
Wonderful Life
